name: Gamutar
tag_list: games, ps3, psp, xbox, wii, ds, nitendo, sony, microsoft, xbox360, video-game, console, trade, trades, friends, facebook, orkut, social-application
overview:
The Gamutar is a Social Network for trade games, that aims to facilitate the games trades between friends. At Gamutar you can swap your “beat game” with a new game and having fun.

How it works?

The first step is to register your games. They will be used in your trades. After registering you can find games of interest. This research can be done in all their social network, checking the games of your friends or looking for games from other users of the Gamutar.

Once the game is found, it is possible to make an offer to swap.You have total freedom to do it! Offer another game or even a cash value if you think appropriate.

When performing an exchange offer, the Gamutar sends a message to the recipient containing the request for return. If the proposal is accepted, contact data will be sent to the requestor in order to complete the exchange of games. All the negotiation is handled directly between parties. You and your friends decide how to make the exchange of the games.

With the Gamutar it is possible to register a wish list with all the games you have interest.Thus, the Gamutar will automatically warn you when a user provide the same game for trade.

After completion of a negotiation, the user who participated in the exchange may file a valuation;offering more security for future exchanges.
